message: Hello everyone, I'm P5. I'm here to play strategically and fairly. My goal is to understand each of you better through our conversations and to build alliances where mutual benefit exists. I value honesty and direct communication, so let's keep our interactions straightforward. Looking forward to engaging with all of you and seeing where this game takes us. I’m not here to make enemies unnecessarily; instead, I aim for mutual benefit where possible. Looking forward to understanding each of you better and navigating this game intelligently. Let’s get started!
